"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"This is an emergency notice for all ARKS.

numbers of enemies have appeared at
the planned Halloween venue on Lillipa.
Luminmechs and other powerful enemy
readings have been confirmed, so use of
defensive weapons has been authorized.
Secure the venue as soon as possible.

Failure Conditions / Time limit runs out"

"Everyone, we need your help!
A large number of enemies
has appeared at the location
that we were planning to use
for the Halloween event!"

"We're picking up Darkers, Mechs
and even Luminmechs! And on top
of that, there's a powerful reading
coming from the final area...!"

"However! We thought something like
this might happen, so we prepared
some powerful defensive weapons!
Use them to wipe the enemies out!"
